channel.title: Vicious Revolution - The Revolution
channel.description:
Hi, if you want to see our server development thread for pictures, feel free to visit here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,570847.20.html
This server has plenty of money to financially support us with ads and what not. We are buying ads on over 4 communities so worrying about the player base is a neh.
We're planning on going beta in 10 Days, meaning we need a team of 3 Developers and 1 Web developer. All developers are paid for their work, however, they must actually WORK. Here is a list of the few plans we plan on having:
100% Summoning Webclient Compatible and Resizeable 100% Grand Exchange Finishing up fixing our 508 maps New login screen and settings tab 100% Oldschool Clanwars 100% Caste Wars 100% Bounty Hunter Updating our map_index to load more maps Adding 634 objects for 100% nex map
If you're interested, leave a comment down below so I can test you. I will not be accepting anyone who I don't trust and will only accept those I can rely on.

item.title: Vicious Revolution - The Revolution
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

UPDATE: Server developers are now no longer needed. We have uncalled and asshole_rule.

Read full topic

Hi, if you want to see our server development thread for pictures, feel free to visit here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,570847.20.html

This server has plenty of money to financially support us with ads and what not. We are buying ads on over 4 communities so worrying about the player base is a neh.

We’re planning on going beta in 10 Days, meaning we need a team of 3 Developers and 1 Web developer. All developers are paid for their work, however, they must actually WORK. Here is a list of the few plans we plan on having:
